com.smartsheet.api

Interface AttachmentResources


  • public interface AttachmentResources

    This interface provides methods to access Attachment resources by their id.

    Thread Safety: Implementation of this interface must be thread safe.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Attachment attachNewVersion(long attachmentId, File file, String contentType)
      Attach a new version of an attachment.
      Attachment attachNewVersion(long attachmentId, InputStream inputStream, String contentType, long contentLength, String attachmentName)
      Attach a new version of an attachment.
      void deleteAllAttachmentVersions(long id)
      Deletes an attachment, including all of its versions.
      Attachment getAttachment(long id)
      Get an attachment.
      List<Attachment> listAttachmentVersions(long id)
      Get all versions of an attachment.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttachment

        Attachment getAttachment(long id)
                         throws SmartsheetException

        Get an attachment.

        It mirrors to the following Smartsheet REST API method:
        GET /attachment/{id}

        Parameters:
        id - the id
        Returns:
        the attachment (note that if there is no such resource, this method will throw ResourceNotFoundException rather than returning null).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or empty string
        InvalidRequestException - if there is any problem with the REST API request
        AuthorizationException - if there is any problem with the REST API authorization (access token)
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the resource cannot be found
        ServiceUnavailableException - if the REST API service is not available (possibly due to rate limiting)
        SmartsheetException - if there is any other error during the operation

      • deleteAllAttachmentVersions

        void deleteAllAttachmentVersions(long id)
                                 throws SmartsheetException

        Deletes an attachment, including all of its versions.

        It mirrors to the following Smartsheet REST API method:
        DELETE /attachment/{id}/versions

        Parameters:
        id - the id
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or empty string
        InvalidRequestException - if there is any problem with the REST API request
        AuthorizationException - if there is any problem with the REST API authorization (access token)
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the resource cannot be found
        ServiceUnavailableException - if the REST API service is not available (possibly due to rate limiting)
        SmartsheetException - if there is any other error during the operation

      • listAttachmentVersions

        List<Attachment> listAttachmentVersions(long id)
                                        throws SmartsheetException

        Get all versions of an attachment.

        It mirrors to the following Smartsheet REST API method:
        GET /attachment/{id}/versions

        Parameters:
        id - the id
        Returns:
        the attachment (note that if there is no such resource, this method will throw ResourceNotFoundException rather than returning null).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or empty string
        InvalidRequestException - if there is any problem with the REST API request
        AuthorizationException - if there is any problem with the REST API authorization (access token)
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the resource cannot be found
        ServiceUnavailableException - if the REST API service is not available (possibly due to rate limiting)
        SmartsheetException - if there is any other error during the operation

      • attachNewVersion

        Attachment attachNewVersion(long attachmentId,
                          File file,
                          String contentType)
                            throws FileNotFoundException,
                                   SmartsheetException

        Attach a new version of an attachment.

        It mirrors to the following Smartsheet REST API method:
        POST /attachment/{id}/versions

        Parameters:
        attachmentId - the id of the attachment to upload a new version.
        file - the file to attach
        contentType - the content type of the file
        Returns:
        the created attachment
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or empty string
        InvalidRequestException - if there is any problem with the REST API request
        AuthorizationException - if there is any problem with the REST API authorization (access token)
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the resource cannot be found
        ServiceUnavailableException - if the REST API service is not available (possibly due to rate limiting)
        SmartsheetException - if there is any other error during the operation

      • attachNewVersion

        Attachment attachNewVersion(long attachmentId,
                          InputStream inputStream,
                          String contentType,
                          long contentLength,
                          String attachmentName)
                            throws SmartsheetException

        Attach a new version of an attachment.

        It mirrors to the following Smartsheet REST API method:
        POST /attachment/{id}/versions

        Parameters:
        attachmentId - the id of the object
        inputStream - the InputStream of the file to attach
        contentType - the content type of the file
        contentLength - the size of the file in bytes.
        attachmentName - the name of the file.
        Returns:
        the created attachment
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or empty string
        InvalidRequestException - if there is any problem with the REST API request
        AuthorizationException - if there is any problem with the REST API authorization (access token)
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the resource cannot be found
        ServiceUnavailableException - if the REST API service is not available (possibly due to rate limiting)
        SmartsheetException - if there is any other error during the operation
